description:
A new school year begins, and Amami and her friends are
pretty excited about having younger students around. Wanting to be a
model student, Amami tries to help the new freshman class...and so do
her spectral friends. The otherworldly assistance scares off the new
kids and leaves Amami feeling crushed, so Inoue and the others take it
upon themselves to make her more appealing.
Source: crunchyroll
